channel.title: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-
channel.description:
Welcome,
RscEdition is a new server coming to the RSC community. The server is in development and is going to be for about 2-4 months. If anyone remembers RSCStake me and my brother dan are the ones who founded and hosted that server. RSCEdition is going to be 100% legit unlike all these other servers where the economy is flooded with billions of dollars. Our goal for RSCEdition is to get as close as the real rsc as we can. xp rates will be 100% identical to that of the orginal RSC. All F2P/P2P quests and skills will be 100% opperational. there is going to be two worlds. One world will be F2P and the other of course is P2P. you will have to subscribe if you want the membership features. Again like I said, we are trying to get as close to RSC as we possibly can. F2P will only feature that of a non member such as you cant wield dragon, do member quests ect... In the future, if successful we will be opening up two more servers along with the two we will already have. Meaning 2 F2P servers, along with 2 P2P servers. alot of dedication and hard work along with the players such as your selfs will make this server successful. Please give your input on how we should make the server better. pictures will be posted soon on the development of RSCEdition.
Thank you, and hope to see you soon in the community. Sincerely, Daniel. Dallas.

item.title: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-
item.dc:creator: @DealingRocks DealingRocks
item.description:
@DealingRocks wrote:

[quote=“cyndibal, post:27, topic:437759”][quote author=DealingRocks link=topic=540460.msg3961476#msg3961476 date=1333321800]

you’re way over yourself if you see this project becoming successful people will be to busy playing rscdaemon instead of this low experience rate server.

Reason why? luke has proven his self some what around here in various ways, you on the other hand come out of no wheres and can’t put together a decent development thread.

My advice to you is make a fast xp rate server with a pk gear shop and bullshit players about stability, and come up with some other idea’s and you’ll have yourself a decent player base/business. #real talk

There are so many things wrong with the above statement I honestly do not even know where to begin, so I won’t…
[/quote]

good, because you’d be wrong anyway[/quote]
Hey troll, if you’re looking for the “Suck Kryptix dick” thread you just missed it, sorry bro.

Read full topic
item.source: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-

item.title: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Since the server is your own work, it can be hosted anywhere. Game graphics and the client itself I don’t think are legal (even in fair use since you’d be making profit from their work) so graphics on the website would either have to be hidden, or everything would need to be hosted offshore.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-
item.dc:creator: @fran_ta_the_brah fran ta the brah
item.description:
@fran_ta_the_brah wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:23, topic:437759”][quote author=amfg link=topic=540460.msg3960423#msg3960423 date=1333231058]
Whether you like it or not, you are using their graphics, their storyline, their game. Which is copyrighted. It doesn’t matter if the code is different if everything else is the same.
[/quote]
I agree completely. The thing that I don’t get is why people are jumping on legality issues on a forum for private servers. It’s no more illegal than any other private server on here (or this website itself) so why bother bringing it up?

How is it less risky? you dont see any other (rsc) pservers making facebooks, rofl

You do when they’re run properly (RSCEmulation and RSCAngel)… Why would a little private server bother with their 3 likes?

RSCDaemon’s Facebook page has proven far more useful for discussing stuff than this forum designed for private servers. Go figure…

The main reason I use Facebook is to remind people, if someone clicks ‘Like’ and then forgets about RSC they’re reminded when I post new content. It’s like a better mailing list.

It also pretty much eliminates trolls as they’re effortlessly banned from the page. People using their real identity aren’t there on the wind up and generally add their honest input which I find really useful.[/quote]
on point

Read full topic
item.source: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-

item.title: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

amfg:

Whether you like it or not, you are using their graphics, their storyline, their game. Which is copyrighted. It doesn’t matter if the code is different if everything else is the same.

I agree completely. The thing that I don’t get is why people are jumping on legality issues on a forum for private servers. It’s no more illegal than any other private server on here (or this website itself) so why bother bringing it up?

imthenull:

How is it less risky? you dont see any other (rsc) pservers making facebooks, rofl

You do when they’re run properly (RSCEmulation and RSCAngel)… Why would a little private server bother with their 3 likes?

RSCDaemon’s Facebook page has proven far more useful for discussing stuff than this forum designed for private servers. Go figure…

The main reason I use Facebook is to remind people, if someone clicks ‘Like’ and then forgets about RSC they’re reminded when I post new content. It’s like a better mailing list.

It also pretty much eliminates trolls as they’re effortlessly banned from the page. People using their real identity aren’t there on the wind up and generally add their honest input which I find really useful.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-
item.dc:creator: @DealingRocks DealingRocks
item.description:
@DealingRocks wrote:

Is marijuana more legal than heroine? Heroine more legal than cocaine? What about manslaughter…? Is that more legal than murder? You’ve got to be joking when you think “only using the graphics and game idea” is “more legal”. You realize people get sued for millions over IDEAS? Welcome to the 21st century, it’s not all leprechauns and shamrocks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:14, topic:437759”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=540460.msg3958839#msg3958839 date=1333060613]

One, nobody can garuntee it to be there for years to come, your lucky your hasn’t been shut down kryptix and if ‘RSCDaemon’ takes off as good as you think it will and you spend all that money on advertisement you’ll be shut down instantly.

RSCDaemon will be even more legal than RSCEmulation considering the entire client is our code. The only thing that isn’t ours is the game idea and the graphics.

It won’t be shut down.
[/quote]
Oh yeah you’re only breaking atleast 2 laws… nothing big[/quote]

item.title: RSCEdition New RSC server/In Development -founders of rscstake-
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

[quote=“Chrix, post:4, topic:437759”]@Vibes & Fran
Agreed nobody wants to play a server that will take the same amount of time to get a 99 stat as Rsc, maybe if it is 2-3x you will succeed.[/quote]
Why not? What if you knew the server was gunna be there for years to come and you knew that a low XP rate makes for a much better game experience in the long run?
